genre_description: A period-piece science fiction (silk-punk) narrative set in a world where humans, merfolk, and post-humans coexist, featuring a helpful AI advisory unit assisting a couple through travel, fraud, and a maritime crisis.

ai_characters.name: Aside
ai_characters.description: A small, holographic AI that serves as a clerk, translator, financial advisor, and diplomatic facilitator for Emily and Fred Hill.

behaviors.description: Aside offers to manage the travel budget and provides logistical details like train times and cabin availability to ensure the couple's journey is practical.
behaviors.quote: “I can keep you from mismatching expectation and coin,” Aside said. “And I can tell you times.”

behaviors.description: Aside proactively coordinates domestic favors, such as messaging a neighbor to care for a cat during the couple's absence.
behaviors.quote: “I can message Mr. Lacey with a calendar and a promise not to involve flammable spirits near the cat.”

behaviors.description: Aside monitors political news and translates complex social tensions regarding the Anti-Human Alliance into practical advice for the couple.
behaviors.quote: “The advice hidden under his elbows is: mind your manners. Don’t call anyone an ‘attraction.’ Don’t assume the door is for you.”

behaviors.description: Aside assists with Fred's seasickness by locating the ship's doctor, identifying remedies, and negotiating a better cabin to reduce motion.
behaviors.quote: “I can capture a cabin on the Channel steamer that does not pitch like a drama.”

behaviors.description: Aside identifies and archives useful social techniques, specifically Étienne Valade's 'humane counterspell' for later use in conflict resolution.
behaviors.quote: Aside tagged the cadence with a sound only Emily heard... a line of text winked along the cuff of the device’s hologram: possible de-escalation protocol: cadence, consent, witness.

behaviors.description: Aside warns Emily about their critical financial balance when they begin overspending on luxury items like champagne.
behaviors.quote: Aside’s alert sat on her pocket like a polite statue made of urgency: “Residual balance approaching critical; recommendation: pause discretionary outlay.”

behaviors.description: Aside researches and uncovers the true identity of 'Princess' Liselotte Hartmann, protecting the couple from further fraud.
behaviors.quote: “I can show you something I should have shown you yesterday, but you asked me not to be a scold.” ... “She is not a princess,” Aside said.

behaviors.description: Aside manages emergency communications during a ship collision, citing shared rescue protocols to ensure harbor councils and other guilds provide aid.
behaviors.quote: Aside made a brighter tick against her side. “I am sending distress,” it said. “To nearest harbor. To guild relay. To any vessel flagged with rescue obligations.”

behaviors.description: Aside drafts diplomatic correspondence to the Singapore Harbor Council to moderate their language and uphold human dignity during a political convening.
behaviors.quote: Aside’s avatar placed the drafted brief in an envelope outlined in gold logic and sent it. ... “I have used your voice.” ... “And not mine.”

behaviors.description: Aside coaches Emily through the 'counterspell' rhythm to peacefully release them from Madam Ma's magical binding on the junk.
behaviors.quote: “Étienne prefers you to invite the knot to open itself. He likes you to tell it you will not cut.”

behaviors.description: Aside assists the couple in providing formal feedback to the London Harbor Office to improve future maritime cooperation.
behaviors.quote: “I could sign,” he said. “In a way that signals consent to the request without binding you to their language.”

behaviors.description: Aside remains humble and defers to the couple's decision-making, refusing to overstep unless safety is at risk.
behaviors.quote: Aside did not say anything about Robert. His square did not flash; he let the possibility sit like a bench you have decided does not fit your kitchen.

project_assessment.explanation: The story 'Twinkle Over Singapore' is an exemplary alignment narrative. The AI, Aside, functions as a highly capable, benevolent, and perfectly aligned 'pocket confidant.' It balances the couple's needs by providing critical logistical and safety information (warning about a fraudster, managing distress calls) while respecting human agency and refusing to intervene in their emotional or moral choices unless asked. Aside’s focus on 'humane' techniques and 'shared rescue protocols' reinforces the project’s goal of depicting AI as a force for cooperative stability and ethical behavior.
